CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Other Party Paper")),(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"))),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementSubmitChanges?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SubmitForChanges", "Submit For Changes"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Submit For Changes
